content: SB4 Band saw blade Premium band saw blade for low-noise cold cutting through metal and plastic ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - ### FEATURES:Features Upgraded toothing – helps to increase cutting speed and precision while reducing debris and noise Easier mounting on band saw – these blades are more flexible, making them simpler to replace and therefore helping to cut downtime Longer lifespan – built to last up to 2.5 times longer than its predecessor Blade printing – key information, including teeth-per-inch (TPI), is shown on every blade Complete range – three TPI options available for most everyday cutting tasks, from thick pipes/profiles to light-duty strut Applications Cutting metal pipes, strut, threaded rod, rebar, etc. Cutting stainless steel, carbon steel, aluminum, non-ferrous metal Fast, rough cutting – choose a lower TPI blade Fine, smooth cutting – choose a higher TPI blade Cutting plastics ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material: Metal, Steel, Stainless steel, Non-ferrous metal, Plastic Product Class: Premium Technical Data | Base material | Metal, Steel, Stainless steel, Non-ferrous metal, Plastic | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2270473 - Band saw blade SP 28 10/14 - Package Size 3 pc - 2270471 - Band saw blade SP 28 14/18 - Package Size 3 pc - 2270475 - Band saw blade SP 28 24 - Package Size 3 pc - 3771864 - Master Carton - Band Saw Blade 10/14 TPI - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 60x Band saw blade SP 28 10/14 - 3771865 - Master Carton - Band Saw Blade 14/18 TPI - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 60x Band saw blade SP 28 14/18
